name: Overheated
description:
Isn't it cool to fly in space with your own space ship?

Sadly we don't know whether you thik so, however we are sure as hell that it is.  
So fell free to play our game which was made for Innovator's Jam 2021.

Your main goal is to strike down enemy ships, better stay in move becouse stopping leads to easy dying, oh and don't forget about overheatting .
